Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
1. open existing project's manifest file 
2. write activator full qualified path and use link to create new Activator file
3. click finish on new class wizard
4. NPE is thrown and new empty file is created

Your patch is good. But I have problems parsing this method. Isn't my patch semantical equivalent? And if yes, why are the existing constructors removed when accountExisting? Are they removed at all? Aren't the method bindings from the super type always different from the subtype (if declared methods)?

You're right, but we better fix this in 3.4.
